sentences: Kõik on edenenud nii, nagu lootsin.
Suve edenedes saabus siia üha rohkem suvitajaid.
context: The word 'lootsin' is the first person singular past tense form of the Estonian verb 'looda', which means to hope, expect, or trust. It appears in context with the word 'edened' (progressed/advanced), suggesting an expectation that things would proceed as hoped for.
